abstract: In a survey of some 3,500 Wall Street professionals, JPMorgan’s investment bank was selected as the best firm to work for in North America this year, judging by quality of life and overall prestige.
snippet: In a survey of some 3,500 Wall Street professionals, JPMorgan’s investment bank was selected as the best firm to work for in North America this year, judging by quality of life and overall prestige.
lead_paragraph: A multibillion-dollar trading loss and multiple regulatory investigations apparently haven’t made life too miserable at JPMorgan Chase.

headline.main: Survey Deems JPMorgan’s Investment Bank Best Place to Work
